name: Blendy's Fruit Factory
description:
- Grow Fruit!
- Blend Fruit!
- Make Money!

You work as the supplier for Blendy's, a smoothy factory. You must collect and 'sacrifice' your fruits lives in order to make money for your farm. Can you collect all you need to win the game and be the very best fruit farmer? Find out by playing Blendy's Fruit Factory!
